details.title: Jenkins Test Time Difference Table Generator
details.description: Generates a table to see the time difference betweent the tests of two Jenkins builds.

preference.name: decimals
preference.label: Number of decimals
preference.description: The amount of decimals to be shown

inputendpoint.name: test-list
inputendpoint.label: Build Test List
inputendpoint.description: List of tests passed by the builds to be displayed on the widget

outputendpoint.name: dataset
outputendpoint.label: Table Data Model
outputendpoint.description: A JSON or an object with two fields: structure (for the structure of the data) and data (the data ifself)
